title: Taking Chances
description: Asia is a college freshman, starting a new life away from a bad situation and intent on keeping herself safe. Falling in love isn’t something she has even thought about doing and she doesn’t know if it’s such a good idea. Especially with someone she works for.Nathan is the youngest college professor on campus and has hired a new assistant to help him. He is focused on his five year plan but the new girl in his life keeps drawing his eye and, before he knows it, his heart.What does the future hold for them and what will the pas do to try to keep them apart.
author: Angela  Andrews
